txt.en: Maeriel needs word of the diseased boars and aggressive Wargs brought to her fellow Ranger.

'You have shown yourself to be far more dependable than my brother, so I wonder if I can entrust you with another task. I was meant to meet with my fellow Ranger, Calargyl, at Amon Firn, but I daren't leave Merruth unattended.\n\n'Would you bring Calargyl word of what we saw here? The diseased boars and the encroaching Warg presence is unsettling. Some darkness has swept through Cardolan, I am sure of it.'

'Greetings! I am indeed Calargyl. So, Maeriel was left once more to clean up her brother's mess? I am not surprised by that, but the rest of the news you bring is quite troubling. I have myself witnessed strange things indeed.'
Maeriel has asked you to talk to her fellow Ranger, Calargyl about what you all saw and did here in Sedgemead.\n\nCalargyl is near Amon Firn, in north-eastern Cardolan.
